casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Billy Dean MORGAN 150A18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. June 20, 2018 Sterling Rozear, Attorney at Law, for Morgan, Billy Dean Brenda Eaddy, Assistant Attorney General, Ted Bell, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 18th of June 2018 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 20th of June 2018."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 12th day of July 2018 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
